Sentencas: Carbon colloids prepared by hydrothermal carbonization (HTC) are applied as a carbon source for the use in a model anodic half-cell of an indirect carbon fuel cell.
Titulo: Carbon Colloids Prepared by Hydrothermal Carbonization as Efficient Fuel for Indirect Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A high performance due to the amorphous chemical structure and the controlled topology on the nano- and micrometer levels of this carbon fuel was found.
Titulo: Carbon Colloids Prepared by Hydrothermal Carbonization as Efficient Fuel for Indirect Carbon Fuel Cells
